categories: Category:X-Wing: Second Edition Expansion Packs: Second Wave

nodes.text: The RZ-2 A-Wing Expansion Pack is an expansion to the tactical ship-to-ship combat game Star Wars: X-Wing Second Edition from Fantasy Flight Games. It is a Resistance expansion to the Second Wave of the Core Set for the new stand-alone game. It was released on December 13, 2018.

The main interceptor of the Resistance, the RZ-2 A-wing by Kuat Systems Engineering is the natural evolution of its predecessor. With field-tested refinements integrated into its design such as incredible maneuverability, reversible laser cannons, and precision ordnance, mastering this craft is a challenge worthy of the greatest aces.

With six ship cards—including four unique pilots—and five upgrade cards, plus the maneuver dial and tokens included in this expansion pack, the RZ-2 A-Wing Expansion Pack gives you everything you need to stand toe-to-toe with the First Order's best!
